title: Solvating lithium and tethering aluminium by di-coordination-strength anions for low-temperature lithium metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE03809B, Communication
Jin-Xiu Chen, Jin-Hao Zhang, Xiao-Zhong Fan, Fang-Fang Wang, Wen Tang, Wei Xia, Yusheng Zhao, Long Kong
The corrosive lithium bis(fluorosulfonyl)imide (LiFSI) for aluminium (Al) current collector is impeded by a concept of di-coordination-strength anions. This concept adopts weakly coordinated anion (FSIâˆ’) to exert high ionic transport...
